alert.note: Alert for Victoria (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 5:58PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Victoria County through 630 PM CDT... At 558 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles south of Ezzell, or 16 miles northwest of Edna, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Victoria, Fordtran, Salem and Victoria Mall. This includes US Highway 77 between mile markers 560 and 574. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
